data.text:
Several days have passed since the festival I went to with Inari One. 
When I was passing through the front gate of Tracen Academy――
data.processed:
<story>Several days have passed since the festival I went to with Inari One. 
<story>When I was passing through the front gate of Tracen Academy――

data.text:
Let's see, the front gate is this way……oh, Uooh!! 
You're, from that time……！
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Let's see, the front gate is this way……oh, Uooh!! 
<story>You're, from that time……！

data.text:
Tahaha, looks like ya found me. 
Well～, you see, the reason I came here……
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Tahaha, looks like ya found me. 
<story>Well～, you see, the reason I came here……

data.text:
！……is that okay？ That'd be helpful！ 
Hehe……seems like the complete opposite from when we first met, huh？
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>！……is that okay？ That'd be helpful！ 
<story>Hehe……seems like the complete opposite from when we first met, huh？

data.text:
Haa～, I'd heard the rumors but, a huge dorm, 
huge gym, huge cafeteria…… and even this huuuuge training ground！
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Haa～, I'd heard the rumors but, a huge dorm, 
<story>huge gym, huge cafeteria…… and even this huuuuge training ground！

data.text:
……So this is Tracen Academy, huh. 
Well, the facilities are all like that too――
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>……So this is Tracen Academy, huh. 
<story>Well, the facilities are all like that too――

data.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa, haa……！！
data.name: Both Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>Haa, haa, haa, haa, haa……！！

data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(Are they doing……parallel running？ From the looks of it, they're 
<story>nearing the end……seems like they're competing with each other 
<story>while feeling out the timing for their attack……)

data.text:
Haa, haa…… right here……！ 
HaaaAAAAa！！
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa…… right here……！ 
<story>HaaaAAAAa！！

data.text:
(Uoh！？ Already！？ 
Ain't it too early to push forward……！？)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(Uoh！？ Already！？ 
<story>Ain't it too early to push forward……！？)

data.text: ……！ No…… not yet……！！
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed: <story>……！ No…… not yet……！！

data.text: Kuu…… Fine, in that case……I'll keep pushing forward like this！！
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed: <story>Kuu…… Fine, in that case……I'll keep pushing forward like this！！

data.text: DaaAAAAAAー！！
data.name: Both Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>DaaAAAAAAー！！

data.text: Haaa, haaa, haa……！！
data.name: Both Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>Haaa, haaa, haa……！！

data.text:
Good. Last time your assignment was to supplement your last leg 
performance. Pushing forward early and trying to draw your 
opponent in to a stamina battle――it's a good tactic！
data.name: Instructor A
data.processed:
<story>Good. Last time your assignment was to supplement your last leg 
<story>performance. Pushing forward early and trying to draw your 
<story>opponent in to a stamina battle――it's a good tactic！

data.text:
Let's raise your stamina more and more. We'll switch the 
focus of your self training to that. And then, for you――
data.name: Instructor A
data.processed:
<story>Let's raise your stamina more and more. We'll switch the 
<story>focus of your self training to that. And then, for you――

data.text:
Good job not being drawn in！ Believing in your own last leg 
performance and maintaining your own pace until the end. 
Let's keep refining that sharpness.
data.name: Instructor A
data.processed:
<story>Good job not being drawn in！ Believing in your own last leg 
<story>performance and maintaining your own pace until the end. 
<story>Let's keep refining that sharpness.

data.text:
Both of you, you're building up more ways to appeal to trainers. 
Let's build up some more while aiming for Selection Races！
data.name: Instructor A
data.processed:
<story>Both of you, you're building up more ways to appeal to trainers. 
<story>Let's build up some more while aiming for Selection Races！

data.text: Yes！ Thank you very much！！
data.name: Both Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>Yes！ Thank you very much！！

data.text:
(Selection, which means……wait wait, they're like that and they 
haven't even debuted yet！？ I heard the level here was high but――)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(Selection, which means……wait wait, they're like that and they 
<story>haven't even debuted yet！？ I heard the level here was high but――)

data.text:
――Sorry. We'd like to use this place now, 
would you mind moving？
data.processed:
<story>――Sorry. We'd like to use this place now, 
<story>would you mind moving？

data.text:
Oh！ Sorry, I'll move now―― 
……？
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Oh！ Sorry, I'll move now―― 
<story>……？

data.text:
Oh my～. Are you here inspecting the school？ 
I'm sorry. Looks like we're bothering you～
data.processed:
<story>Oh my～. Are you here inspecting the school？ 
<story>I'm sorry. Looks like we're bothering you～

data.text: Ah, no, it's fine. It's not something ya have to apologize for……
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>Ah, no, it's fine. It's not something ya have to apologize for……

data.text:
(……Huh？ These two……what's with them？ 
There's a strange……sense of pressure――)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(……Huh？ These two……what's with them？ 
<story>There's a strange……sense of pressure――)

data.text: ……Hey. You, do ya know anything about those two？
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: They're Oguri Cap and Super Creek
They're Oguri Cap and Super Creek

data.processed: <story>……Hey. You, do ya know anything about those two？

data.text:
I answer her question. Both of them are Uma Musume who haven't debuted yet. 
However――

choices.text: Both of them have huge potential

data.processed:
<story>I answer her question. Both of them are Uma Musume who haven't debuted yet. 
<story>However――

data.text:
Haa, haa, haa, haa, haa……！！ 
Right here……push forward！！
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, haa, haa, haa……！！ 
<story>Right here……push forward！！

data.text: Ufufu…… I won't let you！！
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: <story>Ufufu…… I won't let you！！

data.text: HaaAAAAAAAa！！
data.name: Oguri&Creek
data.processed: <story>HaaAAAAAAAa！！

data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>……！！

data.text:
(Hey…… hey, hey, hey, hey, what's with them！？ 
That white one, she had such a dopey look on her face just now, 
but with that kind of grit, it seems like a lie！)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(Hey…… hey, hey, hey, hey, what's with them！？ 
<story>That white one, she had such a dopey look on her face just now, 
<story>but with that kind of grit, it seems like a lie！)

data.text:
(On the other hand, that big one！ It's hard to see……
the true depth of her potential！ Just looking at her……
it feels like I'll be overwhelmed……！)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(On the other hand, that big one！ It's hard to see……
<story>the true depth of her potential！ Just looking at her……
<story>it feels like I'll be overwhelmed……！)

data.text: What is this……what's with those two……！
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>What is this……what's with those two……！

data.text:
Next to me, Inari One had her breath taken away. 
Judging by her reaction, she was completely overwhelmed 
by their parallel running, but……
data.processed:
<story>Next to me, Inari One had her breath taken away. 
<story>Judging by her reaction, she was completely overwhelmed 
<story>by their parallel running, but……

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: You can win against those two
You can win against those two

data.processed: <story>Eh?

data.text:
――400m remain！ The leader is Oguri Cap, 
but Super Creek pulls forward！ Super Creek takes the lead！！
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>――400m remain！ The leader is Oguri Cap, 
<story>but Super Creek pulls forward！ Super Creek takes the lead！！

data.text:
Super Creek and Oguri Cap……and here comes Inari One！！ 
Inari One pushes forward！！
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Super Creek and Oguri Cap……and here comes Inari One！！ 
<story>Inari One pushes forward！！

data.text: DaaAAAARyaaAAAAA！！
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>DaaAAAARyaaAAAAA！！

data.text:
200m remain！ Who will take the lead this time, 
Inari One or Super Creek！？ The leader is――
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>200m remain！ Who will take the lead this time, 
<story>Inari One or Super Creek！？ The leader is――

data.text:
OraaAAAAAAAAAAAAA！！ 
HaaAAAAAAーーー！！
data.name: Inari&Creek
data.processed:
<story>OraaAAAAAAAAAAAAA！！ 
<story>HaaAAAAAAーーー！！

data.text:
Inari One！ It's Inari One！！ Inari One takes the lead！！ 
――And goal！！
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Inari One！ It's Inari One！！ Inari One takes the lead！！ 
<story>――And goal！！

data.text:
The one who emerges victorious from this heated battle is Inari One！！ 
The stands erupt in to a loud cheer！！
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The one who emerges victorious from this heated battle is Inari One！！ 
<story>The stands erupt in to a loud cheer！！

data.text:
(……a narrow victory after a tough battle with opponents like these. 
An explosive cheer louder than fireworks, with the Chief 
and everyone from town there)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(……a narrow victory after a tough battle with opponents like these. 
<story>An explosive cheer louder than fireworks, with the Chief 
<story>and everyone from town there)

data.text:
(And then, after I've won, 
those guys joyfully come runnin'――)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>(And then, after I've won, 
<story>those guys joyfully come runnin'――)

data.text:
Uwaaa！？ Ah……J-just now…… 
………………
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
<story>Uwaaa！？ Ah……J-just now…… 
<story>………………

data.text: ……Sorry！ I need to…… get goin' now！！
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: <story>……Sorry！ I need to…… get goin' now！！

data.text: ……Geez. I thought something like this might happen, you idiot.
data.name: Chief
data.processed: <story>……Geez. I thought something like this might happen, you idiot.

data.text:
We meet again, Trainer-san. 
Well then――
data.name: Chief
data.processed:
<story>We meet again, Trainer-san. 
<story>Well then――

data.text:
I'd like to ask you for a favor. 
……Next time, there's a race I would like you to come and see, how about it？
data.name: Chief
data.processed:
<story>I'd like to ask you for a favor. 
<story>……Next time, there's a race I would like you to come and see, how about it？

title: The Spirit I Was Born With
